title: kaNDuLLam
sahitya:
kaNDuLLam kaLittiDum nAL enrO nAn kaliyuga varadanaik-kandanai oru taram


anupallavi

  viNNavar tuyarinai vEruDan kaLaittiDa andi vaNNan tanda Arumukhanai nAn


caraNam    tUru koNDezhunda shUra padumanai vIru koNDE vandu vElinAl vIzhtti
 shIrulAvum tiuccendUril tangip-pArellAm kAttiDum panniru kaiyanaik
